lines.text: Too good for the guy that owned it. Remember that draw you taught me? It worked - he went down with his gun in the leather.
And now you're an in-case man.
Yeah, in case you miss six times with one, you draw the other... if you have time.
That's too bad. You got an omelet comin' up.
Because I like to steal! Maybe I like to see what people will do when I take it away from them.
What happens when something is taken away from you?
